article_title: The Supercut of the Mainstream Media Savaging the Obamacare Rollout That You’ve Been Waiting For
article_text:
It’s no secret that the rollout of the Obamacare online exchanges has mostly been a massive, glitchy failure.

But perhaps more remarkable than the failure of HealthCare.gov is the fact that the major news networks, ABC, CBS and NBC, haven’t held back in savaging the error-riddled website.

But don’t take our word for it.

Here to put everything into perspective is a Washington Free Beacon supercut of anchors from the three major networks brutalizing the failed rollout of Obamacare:

–

Follow Becket Adams (@BecketAdams) on Twitter

article_summary:
It’s no secret that the rollout of the Obamacare online exchanges has mostly been a massive, glitchy failure.
Here to put everything into perspective is a Washington Free Beacon supercut of anchors from the three major networks brutalizing the failed rollout of Obamacare:–Follow Becket Adams (@BecketAdams) on Twitter
But perhaps more remarkable than the failure of HealthCare.gov is the fact that the major news networks, ABC, CBS and NBC, haven’t held back in savaging the error-riddled website.
But don’t take our word for it.
